headline: Satya Nadella Says AI Needs A 'New Type Of Inbox'—And Believes Microsoft's Copilot Will Be As Big As Excel And PowerPoint
summary: Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) CEO Satya Nadella isn't just celebrating the company's 50th birthday—he's laying the groundwork for its next 50 years. And it starts with artificial intelligence taking center stage. Nadella believes the company is about to launch something as revolutionary as Excel or PowerPoint once were: its AI assistant, Copilot. The Inbox of the Future Might Not Look Like an Inbox at All Nadella recently sat down with GeekWire to reflect on the company’s evolution. He traced Microsof
